Text.Page:
, I've located the second stone. Please come find me in Highwatch.

- Meren

Meren discovered the location of the Celestial Stone.
The stone was being held as a prize for the winner of the Celestial Arena.
You won the prize, and further empowered the Eternal Crown.

, I was waiting for you.

I've located the second stone.

It's called the Celestial Stone, and it's quite near us.

Have you ever heard of the name Bethania?"No."

She's a legendary entertainer. She's the one who created Bamarama.

She's a born gambler who's always looking for a new game.

She also designed the Celestial Arena.

Speaking of which, there's a tournament to be held at the arena, and wouldn't you know, the Celestial Stone is the prize.

You can find Bethania near the Celestial Arena Manager. To get the stone, you'll have to talk to her.

Welcome, ! Are you here to participate in the tournament?

You'll be able to show off your skills, and compete for fabulous prizes!

What? Eternal Crown? Celestial Stone? I don't know what you're talking about

What, this? It's just a shiny bauble. It isn't worth anything, I checked!

This is a bit depressing."We need the stone."

Well, can you at least pretend to work for it? This arena is designed to challenge the best of the best, and you certainly qualify.

By defeating monster after monster, challengers advance to the final stages. Do you see what I'm saying?

The stone is part of the tournament, I can't just give it away.."You know it's for the Goddess, right?"

I do now. That should give you more motivation to win and claim the prize!

[Speak with {@linkcreature:183#7001#Gaderong} to enter the Celestial Arena.]

Looks like all the contestants are here.

For those who are ready, go speak with Gaderong.

Well done. That was something indeed.

"I won, right?"

Of course you did!
Congratulations!

And here's the stone.

I wish you luck in restoring the Eternal Crown.
Did you get the stone?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Two down, four to go."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

We're on the right track.

Take this. It should help you retrieving the other stones.
I'll let you know when I have more information.
May the goddess be with you.
